articles.title: Aurora shows after solar storm hits Earth amid fear of global outages - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The most intense geomagnetic storm ever recorded resulted in the 1859 Carrington Event when telegraph lines electrified, destroying operators and setting offices ablaze in North America and Europe.

articles.title: France battles huge wildfires, Britain bakes in record heatwave - Reuters
articles.description: Firefighters in southwestern France battled on Tuesday to contain massive forest wildfires and Britain recorded its highest ever temperature, while Portugal reported more than 1,000 heatwave-related deaths as Europe scorches.
